review_blob: A good Amber Ale with a smooth taste and finish. Not too much malt but enough to give it a nice clean taste.

This has to be one of the best Hefeweizens Ive ever consumed in my lifetime. Crisp, Clean, Great Tasting Beer and Im more of a darker beer fan so this surprised me that I ended up enjoying this beer as much as I do. We our now Members of this Brewery and our enjoying our first Growler!
